content: I had 4 months before my university begins this August and I too had the same problem, too many lists and too many things to do. So I decided to focus on trying out as many things as possible and socialise with as many friends as possible as I wouldn’t be able to do that once school begins. Today, I’m glad I did that. I guess, it’s basically putting what you really want to achieve first and let the rest just happen. That’s how I guess you can get a satisfying reward from all that free time.
